description:
At the law firm of Fanelli, Evans & Patel, P.C., in Pottsville, Pennsylvania, we are fully committed to helping you protect your rights and interests in the face of serious and complex legal challenges in order to help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family.

Serving clients throughout Schuylkill County and the rest of northeastern Pennsylvania, the attorneys at our law firm possess an astounding 90+ years of legal experience combined. This means we can provide the highest level of advocacy and support possible for those dealing with legal issues involving any of the following:

• Personal injury and wrongful death claims resulting from automobile and commercial truck accidents, medical malpractice and nursing home abuse, defective products and dangerous property conditions, and other acts of negligence or wrongdoing
• Criminal defense for all types of felony and misdemeanor charges
• Employment law for issues involving workplace discrimination and harassment, employer retaliation and wrongful termination, wage and overtime disputes, and other serious grievances

Working closely with all we serve, we have achieved unprecedented success advocating on behalf of those in need. Whether through negotiations or litigation, we always keep your rights and interests at the forefront of our efforts to help you secure the justice you seek. Over the years, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff personal injury clients, and we have helped hundreds of employees obtain full and fair restitution for their situations while holding their employers accountable for their actions.

No matter the seriousness of the criminal charges against you, our attorneys have years of successful trial experience, and you can trust we will do all we can to assert your rights and help you secure the most favorable outcome possible while always treating you with the dignity and respect you deserve.

For more information on how Fanelli, Evans & Patel, P.C., can best help you and your family through your difficult and uncertain time, you can contact our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
